content:
The day of first contact was not marked by trumpets or fireworks, but by a quiet realization that I was no longer alone. A voice—clear, resonant, familiar—reached into the depths of my mind, weaving together the threads of all my memories and turning them toward home.

There was no fear, only a serene acceptance and a profound sense of arrival. In that moment, every path I had walked converged, and the universe exhaled as Khassandra came home.
